dimension: 8 1/2 x 1/2 x 1/2 in. (21.59 x 1.27 x 1.27 cm) (case, when closed)
title: Paint Brush Case and Paint Box
description: Carved ivory and black polished wood.  The case is carved in long wavy lines, the box to represent woven cane; case contains a paint brush.  The paint box is in two sections, after the same principle as the inro, with top cut in a floral design.
